constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 23 (Friday, February 4, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. FOXX:
H.R. 6606.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 3 of Section 8 of Article 1 of the Constitution
which states ``Congress shall have power to regulate commerce
with foreign Nations, and among the several States, and with
the Indian Tribes.''
[Page H976]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Commerce.

title: Robo COP Act
